entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued July 07 at 3:56PM AKDT until July 07 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE COPPER RIVER BASIN... * Winds...Southeast winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts around 30 mph. * Timing...Through 10 PM AKDT this evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 20 percent.

entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued July 07 at 3:41PM AKDT until July 11 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNINGS REMAIN IN EFFECT FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 220, 221, 222, 223, AND 224... The potential for abundant lightning continues across the forecast area with 3000 to 5000 lightning strokes a day through Friday. This will be combined with extremely dry fuels and minimum Relative Humidity values in the 20 to 40 percent range

entry.title: High Surf Advisory issued July 07 at 10:53AM SST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * SURF...Surfs of 10 to 12 feet will continue to impact south and east facing shores due to a large southerly swell and moderate to fresh tradewinds. * TIMING...through the new week * IMPACTS...strong rip currents and large surfs.
